option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<groupId>org.example</groupId> <artifactId>SpringWsdl</artifactId> <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version> <packaging>jar</packaging>
<name>SpringWsdl</name> <description>Spring Boot WSDL-based Web Service Implementation</description>
<parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.2.0</version> <relativePath/> </parent>
<properties> <java.version>21</java.version> <maven.compiler.source>21</maven.compiler.source> <maven.compiler.target>21</maven.compiler.target> <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- Spring Boot Web Starter --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-logging</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency>
<!-- Spring Web Services (WSDL/SOAP) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web-services</artifactId> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-logging</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency>
<!-- WSDL Parser and XML utilities --> <dependency> <groupId>wsdl4j</groupId> <artifactId>wsdl4j</artifactId> <version>1.6.3</version> </dependency>
<!-- JAXB for XML binding --> <dependency> <groupId>jakarta.xml.bind</groupId> <artifactId>jakarta.xml.bind-api</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.sun.xml.bind</groupId> <artifactId>jaxb-impl</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Ensure Spring's Commons Logging bridge is present (spring-jcl) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-jcl</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Logging --> <!-- Use Log4j2 via Spring Boot starter (replaces default Logback starter) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-log4j2</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Spring AOP for method-level logging aspect --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-aop</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Testing --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-logging</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency> <!-- Spring Web Services test utilities --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.ws</groupId> <artifactId>spring-ws-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin>
<!-- WSDL to Java code generation plugin --> <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>jaxb2-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.1.0</version> <executions> <execution> <id>xjc</id> <goals> <goal>xjc</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <configuration> <!-- Point plugin to the XSD files we created under resources --> <sources> <source>src/main/resources/xsd</source> </sources> <!-- Generated sources go to target/generated-sources/jaxb --> <outputDirectory>${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/jaxb</outputDirectory> </configuration> </plugin>
<!-- Ensure generated sources are added to the project's source roots so IDEs (IntelliJ) pick them up --> <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>build-helper-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.3.0</version> <executions> <execution> <id>add-generated-sources</id> <phase>generate-sources</phase> <goals> <goal>add-source</goal> </goals> <configuration> <sources> <source>${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/jaxb</source> </sources> </configuration> </execution> </executions> </plugin>
<!-- NOTE: Removed the maven-resources-plugin execution that copied generated sources into src/generated/java. Keeping generated sources under target/generated-sources is the preferred approach. --> </plugins> </build> </project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<groupId>org.example</groupId> <artifactId>SpringWsdl</artifactId> <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version> <packaging>jar</packaging>
<name>SpringWsdl</name> <description>Spring Boot WSDL-based Web Service Implementation</description>
<parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.2.0</version> <relativePath/> </parent>
<properties> <java.version>21</java.version> <maven.compiler.source>21</maven.compiler.source> <maven.compiler.target>21</maven.compiler.target> <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- Spring Boot Web Starter --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-logging</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency>
<!-- Spring Web Services (WSDL/SOAP) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web-services</artifactId> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-logging</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency>
<!-- WSDL Parser and XML utilities --> <dependency> <groupId>wsdl4j</groupId> <artifactId>wsdl4j</artifactId> <version>1.6.3</version> </dependency>
<!-- JAXB for XML binding --> <dependency> <groupId>jakarta.xml.bind</groupId> <artifactId>jakarta.xml.bind-api</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.sun.xml.bind</groupId> <artifactId>jaxb-impl</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Ensure Spring's Commons Logging bridge is present (spring-jcl) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-jcl</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Logging --> <!-- Use Log4j2 via Spring Boot starter (replaces default Logback starter) --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-log4j2</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Spring AOP for method-level logging aspect --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-aop</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Add AspectJ runtime explicitly so IDEs resolve org.aspectj.* annotations/classes --> <dependency> <groupId>org.aspectj</groupId> <artifactId>aspectjrt</artifactId> <version>1.9.20.1</version> </dependency>
<!-- Testing --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-logging</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency> <!-- Spring Web Services test utilities --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.ws</groupId> <artifactId>spring-ws-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin>
<!-- WSDL to Java code generation plugin --> <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>jaxb2-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.1.0</version> <executions> <execution> <id>xjc</id> <goals> <goal>xjc</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <configuration> <!-- Point plugin to the XSD files we created under resources --> <sources> <source>src/main/resources/xsd</source> </sources> <!-- Generated sources go to target/generated-sources/jaxb --> <outputDirectory>${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/jaxb</outputDirectory> </configuration> </plugin>
<!-- Ensure generated sources are added to the project's source roots so IDEs (IntelliJ) pick them up --> <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>build-helper-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.3.0</version> <executions> <execution> <id>add-generated-sources</id> <phase>generate-sources</phase> <goals> <goal>add-source</goal> </goals> <configuration> <sources> <source>${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/jaxb</source> </sources> </configuration> </execution> </executions> </plugin>
<!-- NOTE: Removed the maven-resources-plugin execution that copied generated sources into src/generated/java. Keeping generated sources under target/generated-sources is the preferred approach. --> </plugins> </build> </project>
